Can the initial complex number \\( z_0 \\) at t = 0 be determined accurately after observing \\( z(T) \\) at t = T, without knowing whether transformation \\( h(z) \\) was applied?
Explanation: The inability to ascertain the application of \\( h(z) \\) and its potential influence with the unknown factor \\( Q \\) makes it impossible to reliably infer \\( z_0 \\) solely based on the observed state \\( z(T) \\), particularly given the complex exponential dependency.
